author: wn.com
title: Crossover Technologies becomes PGA Official Supplier (PGA - Professional Golfers' Association of GB&I)
text: ( Source : PGA - Professional Golfers' Association of GB& I) 30 Sep 15 Crossover Technologies have taken their mission to tackle the over-stocking of golf shops to the next level by signing up to The PGA's official supplier programme. The
